item.title: Bengaluru Mock Drill: THESE Karnataka Areas To Witness Air Sirens, Blackouts During Defence Mock Drill On May 7
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru Mock Drill: In Karnataka, Bengaluru Urban, Malleshwaram and Raichur have been chosen for a nationwide civil defence mock drill scheduled for May 7, 2025.
